div.p: This content sub-element is available within BIOGRAPHY EDUCATION . captures information regarding influential instructors in a person's life. Placing tags around instructors will allow us to discover whether a number of women writers had the same teacher and whether or not a specific teacher supported and encouraged writing in women. We wish to honour teachers who were also writers or who had significant effect on literary development, but not to record every name given in writerâ€™s memoir about her education. The-element should be placed around the NAME of the Instructor. If name is unknown, occasionally it is acceptable to enclose a description, e.g. an eminent concert pianist.
If this section contains an in-line xml example, use , with the same instructions as above for codeblock.
Question: What if what I want to say was that she was taught by her brother?
Answer: Place an INSTRUCTOR tag around the phrase her brother and standardize the name within a name tag.
